column1: Kata Robata////We ordered the Miso Gyoza
column3: and the Kobe Beef Roll.  As you may have noticed
column4: we weren't in the mood for "raw" on this occasion.  The gyoza was outstanding and the yuzu sauce was some of the best I've had.  Lobster mac rocked!  Chunks of lobster swimming with noodles in a creamy cheese array.  Mmm mmm.  The Kobe beef roll was a bit different.  I think the avocado threw me off.  I'm not saying it wasn't good
column5: cause it was amazing!  That beef was just like butter.
